newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH TWO-YR BOND AUCTION MAX YIELD SET AT 11.6PCT.
newsitem.headline: CZECH TWO-YR BOND AUCTION MAX YIELD SET AT 11.6PCT.

text.p: Maximum yield at the Czech government's auction of five billion crowns worth of two-year bonds has been set at 11.6 percent, the Czech central bank said on Friday.
The Finance Ministry originally announced the American-style auction on October 3.
Bids in the auction are due at 1200 local time (1100 GMT) on November 4.
The bonds will be governed by Czech law and will be issued in book entry form.
